bridge-type.label: Tankerkoenig Configuration
bridge-type.description: Configuration of Tankerkoenig Bridge, which can handle 1 to 10 gas stations (Tankstellen).

parameter.name: apikey
parameter.label: API-Key
parameter.description: Tankerkoenig API-Key. Neccessary registration under https://creativecommons.tankerkoenig.de

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Time
parameter.description: Sets the refresh time. Minimum is 10 minutes.

parameter.name: setupmode
parameter.label: Setup-Mode
parameter.description: In mode Setup no data is polled. After completing the Setup for all stations deactivation this mode will start the polling.

parameter.name: use_OpeningTime
parameter.label: Use_OpeningTime
parameter.description: In mode Use_OpeningTime only those gas stations (Tankstellen) are polled that are actually open.
